CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 2, 1960, pg. A3 reads: "Rev. Abernathy to Speak At Civil Rights Rally - The Rev. Ralph D. Abernathy, among the foremost national civil rights leaders, will be the principal speaker at the big civil rights rally planned for the evening of April 22, at the Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall in Oakland..."
TitMainTitle: Ralph Abernathy speaking at podium in Soldier's and Sailor's Memorial Hall for Civil Rights Rally, Oakland
CatSubject_tab: Abernathy, Ralph, 1926- Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
